# Sparse Dict Learning [Loss](loss.qmd)
- $$L(X) = n^{-1}\Sigma_i^n ||x_i - Dr_i ||^2 + \lambda \Sigma_i |r_i|$
- $\lambda \Sigma_i |r_i|$ is Lasso/L1 [Lp Regularization](Lp%20Regularization.qmd)
- Predictions : $r = argmin_r ||x- Dr_i ||^2 + \lambda \Sigma_i |r_i|$
